verses.name: Proverbs 11:1
verses.text: A false balance is abomination to the Lord: but a just weight is his delight.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:2
verses.text: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:3
verses.text: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:4
verses.text: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:5
verses.text: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:6
verses.text: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them: but transgressors shall be taken in their own naughtiness.
